name: Outta Nowhere
description:
Outta Nowhere is an arcade action game in which the main purpose is to survive as much as possible avoiding the obstacles and defeating the enemies. You will have to jump at the exact moment to avoid the obstacles and shoot with accuracy to the enemies if you want to survive as much as possible.

It’s an entertaining and dynamic game with the only purposes of having fun and improving our personal score the most.

Controls:
Aim: Mouse
Shoot: SHIFT
Jump: SPACEBAR

Credits:
· David Arnau Hernández: menu, HUD and obstacles design
· José Daroqui Plaza: player movement, player shooting, obstacles and enemies spawn, enemy movement and shooting, 2D scroll, level progression and game navigation
· Alejandro Gutiérrez Rodríguez: player animation and desgin, environment design and sound effects

2014.
